name: A Lifetime Of Realistic Simulations
description:
'A Lifetime of Realistic Simulations' allows you to simulate a life you've never had.. yet..

I'm extending this jam-game into a full project, follow developments on GameJolt or the @frycandle twitter account

http://gamejolt.com/games/a-lifetime-of-realistic-simulations/124128

This game was made within 72 hours for the GameJolt GDC Jam 2016
THEME: NUOVO

  • unconventional games
  • weird & quirky
  • short in duration

As in real life, two randomly generated parents will define your character through genes, while your choices and the actions you undertake result in new skills, strengths and weaknesses. Just remember this, every single decision you make will affect you..

Features:

  • accurate simulation of life
  • extensive character creation settings
  • meaningful insights

Some buttons:

  • Escape = Quit
  • R = Restart
  • there's a fullscreen option on the top right of the window
